moves.name: Splash
moves.description: The user just flops and splashes around to no effect at all...

moves.name: Psywave
moves.description: The target is attacked with an odd  psychic wave. The attack varies in intensity.

moves.name: Odor Sleuth
moves.description: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit with Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. It also enables an evasive target to be hit.

moves.name: Psybeam
moves.description: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. It may also cause confusion.

moves.name: Psywave
moves.description: The target is attacked with an odd  psychic wave. The attack varies in intensity.

moves.name: Odor Sleuth
moves.description: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit with Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. It also enables an evasive target to be hit.

moves.name: Psybeam
moves.description: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. It may also cause confusion.

moves.name: Psych Up
moves.description: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the target.

moves.name: Confuse Ray
moves.description: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.

moves.name: Magic Coat
moves.description: A barrier reflects back to the target moves like Leech Seed and moves that damage status.

moves.name: Zen Headbutt
moves.description: The user focuses its willpower to its head and attacks the target. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Rest
moves.description: The user goes to sleep for two turns. It fully restores the user's HP and heals any status problem.

moves.name: Snore
moves.description: An attack that can be used only if the user is asleep. The harsh noise may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Power Gem
moves.description: The user attacks with a ray of light that sparkles as if it were made of gemstones.

moves.name: Psyshock
moves.description: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage.

moves.name: Payback
moves.description: If the user moves after the target, this attack's power will be doubled.

moves.name: Psychic
moves.description: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. It may also reduce the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Bounce
moves.description: The user bounces up high, then drops on the target on the second turn. It may also leave the target with paralysis.
